login.could_not_connect_to_server: Could not connect to the server. Please check the URL and your network connection.

server.enter_url_to_jellyfin_server: Enter the URL to your Jellyfin server
server.server_url_hint: Make sure to include http or https

home.no_internet_message:
No worries, you can still watch
downloaded content.
home.error_message:
Something went wrong.
Please log out and in again.

media.forward_skip_length_hint: Choose length in seconds when skipping in video playback.
media.rewind_length_hint: Choose length in seconds when skipping in video playback.

audio.use_default_audio_hint: Play default audio track regardless of language.
audio.set_audio_track: Set Audio Track From Previous Item
audio.set_audio_track_hint:
Try to set the audio track to the closest match to the last
video.

subtitles.subtitle_mode_hint:
Subtitles are loaded based on the default and forced flags in the
embedded metadata. Language preferences are considered when
multiple options are available.
subtitles.set_subtitle_track: Set Subtitle Track From Previous Item
subtitles.set_subtitle_track_hint:
Try to set the subtitle track to the closest match to the last
video.
subtitles.subtitle_size_hint:
Choose a default subtitle size for direct play (only works for
some subtitle formats).

other.auto_rotate_hint: Important on android since the video player orientation is locked to the app orientation.
other.video_orientation_hint: Set the full screen video player orientation
other.safe_area_in_controls_hint: Enable safe area in video player controls
other.search_engine_hint: Choose the search engine you want to use.
other.show_custom_menu_links_hint: Show custom menu links defined inside your Jellyfin web config.json file

downloads.download_method_hint: Choose the download method to use. Optimized requires the optimized server.
downloads.remux_max_download_hint: This is the total media you want to be able to download at the same time.
downloads.auto_download_hint: This will automatically download the media file when it's finished optimizing on the server.
downloads.optimized_versions_server_hint: Set the URL for the optimized versions server for downloads.

jellyseerr.jellyseerr_warning: This integration is in its early stages. Expect things to change.

languages.title: Languages
languages.app_language_description: Select the language for the app.

downloads.queue_hint: Queue and downloads will be lost on app restart
downloads.new_app_version_requires_re_download_des: The new update reqires content to be downloaded again. Please remove all downloaded content and try again.
downloads.could_not_get_stream_url_from_jellyfin: Could not get stream URL from Jellyfin

toasts.you_are_not_allowed_to_download_files: You are not allowed to download files.
toasts.failed_to_start_download_for_item_unexpe: Failed to start download for {{item}}: Unexpected error
toasts.all_files_folders_and_jobs_deleted_succe: All files, folders and jobs deleted successfully
toasts.an_error_occured_while_deleting_files_an: An error occurred while deleting files and jobs

player.an_error_occured_while_playing_the_video: An error occurred while playing the video. Check logs in settings.
player.could_not_create_stream_for_chromecast: Could not create stream for Chromecast

jellyseerr.are_you_sure_you_want_to_request_all_sea: Are you sure you want to request all seasons?

toasts.jellyseer_does_not_meet_requirements: Jellyseerr server does not meet minimum version requirements! Please update to at least 2.0.0
toasts.jellyseerr_test_failed: Jellyseerr test failed. Please try again.
toasts.failed_to_test_jellyseerr_server_url: Failed to test jellyseerr server url
toasts.you_dont_have_permission_to_request: You don't have permission to request!
